text:
@realDonaldTrump Not the most PER CAPITA...

Total COVID-19 tests per 1,000 people, May 25, 2020 https://t.co/rvW2Purblx

But there are many kinds of "per capita" aren't there?

(Narrator: No, no there are not.) https://t.co/SW7m4NfODA
